about_the_game:
New DLC adds new units, new options to the management phase, and a new game mode.

New Utilities


Speed cameras, CCTV (Closed-circuit television), and drones will bring your work into the 21st century.
Stop worrying about red light jumpers, speeding, or other traffic incidents by setting a speed camera in your city.

Setup CCTV cameras in your city’s most dangerous areas. Video surveillance lets you see the incident from afar – allowing you to make better choices about how to deal with incidents.

Set new field station


Now if your city needs a new hospital, fire, or police station just set a new field station, or buy a mobile station that you could deploy during duty, wherever you will need it.

New Scenarios

New handcrafted scenarios that are immersive and challenging. Play one of the new scenarios and learn to deal with a real big threat!
